title: Karman Holdings CEO Sells Insider Shares For Four Consecutive Weeks
text: For four consecutive weeks, ending on Dec. 12, 2025, Karman Holdings' CEO sold insider shares. The chief executive sold over 200,000 shares within that span.

title: Karman Space & Defense Expands into High-Priority Maritime Defense Market with Agreement to Acquire Seemann Composites and Materials Sciences, Leaders in Advanced Composite Systems for Submarine, UUV/USV and Strategic Naval Surface Platforms
text: HUNTINGTON BEACH, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)---- $KRMN #ImpossibleEndsHere--Karman Expands into Maritime Defense with Agreement to Acquire Seemann Composites & MSC, Leaders in Advanced Composites for Subsea and Surface Vessels.

title: Pentagon Awards Systima, Part of Karman Space & Defense, $5 Million to Expand Solid Rocket Motor Nozzle Production Capacity
text: HUNTINGTON BEACH, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)---- $KRMN #ImpossibleEndsHere--Karman Space & Defense (“Karman”, “Karman Holdings, Inc.” or “the Company”) (NYSE: KRMN), a leader in the rapid design, development and production of critical, next-generation system solutions for launch vehicle, satellite, spacecraft, missile defense, hypersonic and UAS customers, today announced its Systima facility in Mukilteo, WA received $5.0 million in Defense Production Act Title III funding from the U.S. Department of War on October 20, 202.
